name: Legend of Evermore: Kingdom of Kurio
name_original: Legend of Evermore: Kingdom of Kurio
description:
Legend of Evermore: Kingdom of Kurio is a story of Able. Able is from Kurio Ledge, a small town, where he is growing up to be an adventurer. While his parents are away, he is looked after by his Uncle George. Adventure springs into action quickly as Able finds himself defending the entire Kingdom of Kurio. Discover a new world with endless possibilities, accompanied by an original soundtrack, and become the Grand Champion of Evermore!

-Over 25 Quest and 50 Achievements to complete

-8 Skills to train and master
